climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Thoughtful Design] Our seat cushion and lumbar pillow are made of high-density memory foam with a high-quality smooth zipper and soft velvet shell. The seat cushion includes a non-slip design on the bottom so that it does not move once placed on a seat. The cushion maintains its shape, even after numerous uses. The seat cushion and lumbar pillow will provide you with comfortable support, help improve your sitting posture, and alleviate sitting fatigue.

[Applicable Size] The seat cushion measures 18.1 x 14.2 x 3.2 inches and the lumbar support pillow measures 13 x 13 x 4 inches, with adjustable straps installed on the back of the lumbar support pillow to fit various sizes of chairs and user heights. The bottom of the cushion is also made with a skid resistant design so that the cushion will not move once placed on a chair.

[Relieve Hip Pressure &Back Pain] Lumbar pillow with ergonomic curve, in line with the physical characteristics of adults, seat cushion ergonomic U-shaped design, a perfect fit for the curve of the hip. It can effectively relieve back pain, lumbar pain, sciatica and other problems brought about by sitting for long periods.

[Suitable for anywhere] Seat cushion and lumbar pillow are ideal for long office hours, and will help reduce fatigue and enhance work efficiency. Cushions are also suitable for driving cars, taking trains, flying, playing video games at home, or adding to a wheelchair for a more comfortable experience. The seat cushion and lumbar pillow are made of high-quality materials and are a neautral color to match any décor.

[Convenient to Use] The lumbar pillow is equipped with an easy-to-use adjustable back strap, so you can adjust it according to the position that makes you feel most comfortable. The covers of the seat cushion and lumbar support pillow are removable, made of machine washable velvet fabric The side of the cushion has handles that are very convenient to carry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CloudBliss Seat Cushion And Lumbar Support Pillow The seat cushion and lumbar pillow are ergonomically designed, with the cushion perfectly fitting the curve of your hip and the lumbar pillow providing improved support for the natural curve of your back, specifically for back pain, lumbar pain, sciatica, leg numbness and other problems caused by prolonged sitting. Whether you're on the go or sitting at a desk, our cushions and seat cushions provide the support you need to help reduce the pressure on your back and hips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I suffer from degenerative disc disease, including osteoarthritis. Currently, I also have a herniated disc in my lumbar spine. The lumbar pillow really helps keep my spine in the proper position while sitting, thus helping to keep pressure of my spine. It is already helping to alleviate some pain when I need to sit, and I’ve only had it for about 15 minutes now.The seat cushion is also good and provides the proper support for me.This is a great value for the money, and the materials seem to be of good quality.Everyone’s needs are different, but if you’re looking for this type of support in pillows, I recommend trying these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your tushy will be forever grateful!
reviews.reviewText: Hold on to your seats, folks, because I'm about to deliver a review that'll have you in stitches! Introducing the CloudBliss Seat Cushion, the comfiest slice of heaven your derriere will ever encounter.Let me paint you a picture, my friends. Picture this: you plop down on the CloudBliss Seat Cushion, and it's like landing on a cloud made entirely of marshmallows. Oh, the sheer delight! It's like having a personal pillow party for your posterior. Who needs a fancy massage chair when you've got this fluffy wonder?Now, I must warn you, once you settle in, there's a good chance you won't want to get up. The CloudBliss Seat Cushion is so cozy, so snug, that it might just turn you into a seat cushion hoarder. Your friends and family will come over, take one look at your blissed-out face, and demand to know your secret. "CloudBliss," you'll say with a mischievous grin, knowing you've discovered the ultimate comfort hack.But wait, there's more! This cushion isn't just about comfort—it's a multitasking marvel. Need some extra height at your desk? Boom! The CloudBliss Seat Cushion has got you covered. It's like a booster seat for grown-ups, elevating your seating game to new heights. Who needs stilts when you've got the CloudBliss magic?And let's not forget the style factor. This cushion is sleeker than a penguin on ice. It's got a design that'll make your living room scream, "Wow, that person has excellent taste!" You'll become the envy of your book club, the talk of the neighborhood, all thanks to your trusty CloudBliss companion.Now, I know what you're thinking: "But Lenny, what about durability?" Fear not, my friend. The CloudBliss Seat Cushion is built to withstand the test of time. It's made from materials tougher than a marathon runner's spirit, so it'll stick with you through thick and thin, cushioning your tush through countless movie marathons and epic gaming sessions.So, my dear friends, if you're in search of the comfiest, most versatile seat cushion known to humankind, look no further than the CloudBliss Seat Cushion. It's a comedic masterpiece that'll have your rear end singing with joy. Just be prepared for the side effects: uncontrollable laughter, excessive relaxation, and a severe case of cushion addiction. Embrace the bliss, my friends. Embrace the CloudBliss!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Supportive, but not that comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this, at the same time that I bought another similarly priced set from a different brand. After using this for a few days, I received the other. This had a thicker back support, but that had a thicker seated area. In both areas, this was so much better. The support that I get from this from my seat is firm, and helps me sit a little more straight, when combined with the back support. While I tend to prefer a firmer seat, this is a little more firm than I find comfortable by the end of the day. I sit in my chair for several hours at a time, and after about two hours, with touch sensitive pain in that area, I've got to move. Comparing this to the more soft seat though, I still prefer this for the support, and can sit on it longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT cushion for back pain
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my wife for use at work since she sits all day at the computer. So far she says it has REALLYhelped.We are considering another one for the car as she drives some distance to and from work and sits in traffic when the FWY is backed up.According to her she would definitely recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was having lower back pain after sitting at my desk. The seat and back pad has eliminated my pain. They provide support exactly where I need it. The seat cushion is super thick. I highly recommend this product if you have a desk job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The cushion is the best I’ve had in the last two years I don’t have to keep moving around in my desk chair because this cushion works well and the back support is excellent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Straps are too long
reviews.reviewText: I have just a cheap office chair with no support. This set does help a bit and makes me sit up a little straighter. The seat is good and stays in place for me. But the strap are way too long to hold the back in place. I sewed them to make them shorter and it helps a little, but the back moves down the chair a lot. I'm always adjusting it. Since I sit straighter, my back pain is down a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this in the ofc. It's comfortable....just wish it was a tad bigger for both back support and seat.
